program main

    implicit none

    integer :: x, y, turn, a1, a2, K, ans, remainder

    character(len=10) :: winner, a_str, b_str

    ! First part: compute winner

    read(*,*) x, y

    turn =0

    winner = ' ' ! Initialize to empty

    do

        if (mod(turn,2) ==0) then

            ! even turn (Ciel's turn)

            if (can_take(2,2, x, y)) then

                x = x -2

                y = y -2

            else if (can_take(1,12, x, y)) then

                x = x -1

                y = y -12

            else if (can_take(0,22, y)) then ! Wait, need to check y >=22

                y = y -22

            else

                winner = 'Hanako'

                exit

            end if

        else

            !
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
odd turn (Hanako's turn)

            if (can_take(0,22, y)) then

                y = y -22

            else if (can_take(1,12, x, y)) then

                x = x -1

                y = y -12

            else if (can_take(2,2, x, y)) then

                x = x -2

                y = y -2

            else

                winner = 'Ciel'

                exit

            end if

        end if

        turn = turn +1

    end do

    ! Second part: process winner's name to get K

    a_str = winner

    a1 =0

    do i =2, len_trim(a_str)

        if (a_str(i:i) == a_str(i-1:i-1)) then

            if (a_str(i:i) == '1') then

                a_str(i:i) = '0'

            else

                a_str(i: i) = '1'

            end if

            a1 = a1 +1

        end if

    end do

    b_str = winner

    a2 =0

    do i = len_trim(b_str), 2, -1

        if (b_str(i:i) == b_str(i-1:i-1)) then

            if (b_str(i-1:i-1) == '1') then

                b_str(i-1:i-1) = '0'

            else

                b_str(i-1:i-1) = '1'

            end if

            a2 = a2 +1

        end if

    end do

    K = min(a1, a2)

    ! Third part: compute the result

    if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then

        ans = -1

    else

        if (mod(K,7) ==0) then

            K = K /7

        end if

        K = K *9

        ans =1

        remainder = mod(10, K)

        do while (remainder /=1)

            ans = ans +1

            remainder = mod(remainder *10, K)

        end do

    end if

    write(*,*) ans

contains

    logical function can_take(x_needed, y_needed, x_available, y_available)

        integer, intent(in) :: x_needed, y_needed, x_available, y_available

        can_take = (x_needed <= x_available) .and. (y_needed <= y_available)

    end function can_take

end program main

        remainder = (remainder *10) % K;

    return ans;

logical function can_take(x_needed, y_needed, x_available, y_available)
    integer, intent(in) :: x_needed, y_needed, x_available, y_available
    can_take = (x_needed <= x_available) .and. (y_needed <= y_available)
end function
